programme.title: Murders In Brouage
programme.desc: A young majorette is found murdered near the property of a Chinese wine grower. Although the case appears straightforward, Gendarme captain Claire soon uncovers a complicated web of xenophobia, family troubles and dirty small-town politics.

programme.title: Playmaker
programme.desc: A former footballer and jailbird, Ivo is no longer interested in football. That is until he meets Lukas, a talented young player, and decides to help him pursue a professional career. But his criminal past soon catches up with him.

programme.title: Life Feels Good
programme.desc: The true story of Mateusz, a man suffering from cerebral palsy, who in his early childhood had been diagnosed as a retard with no contact with the outside world. After twenty-five years it turned out that he was a perfectly normal and intelligent person.

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - The Soul Circle
programme.desc: Two detectives find a newborn baby in a basket on Lake Constance, with a mysterious message, and whose mother, Rita Hafner, was presumed murdered 6 months ago. Two detectives must investigate mysterious symbols and dark legends in order to save her.

programme.title: I'm Not In Love
programme.desc: After receiving a marriage ultimatum from a woman he's not sure he truly loves, Rob is up against the clock to realise he should stop looking for the fabled 'Miss Right' and learn to see what's right in front of him.

programme.title: Europa
programme.desc: Kamal has fled Iraq to try to enter "Fortress Europe". At the Turkish-Bulgarian border, local mercenaries are ruthlessly hunting down migrants. Alone in the forest, Kamal has three days to escape.

programme.title: Joy Of Fatherhood
programme.desc: Felix enjoys his single life to the fullest, but a ferret bites him, sterilizing him in the process. He tries everything in his power to find the soon-to-be mother of his only child, the result of his first and last sperm donation.

programme.title: Tokyo Fianc ée
programme.desc: A charming and tender tale of young love and cultural discovery. Amélie, a Japanophile young Belgian woman in Tokyo falls into a whirlwind romance with Rinri, a Francophile Japanese student.

programme.title: Road To Your Heart
programme.desc: In this sweet road-trip movie, Basson, a young businessman journeys to Cape Town for his father’s funeral and to fulfill certain tasks in the will. He meets bohemian Amory along the way and they encounter hilarious moments, disappointments and heartaches.

programme.title: Veins Of The World
programme.desc: After his father dies in a tragic car accident, 11-year-old Amra sets out to continue his father’s vision of the traditional nomad way of life and to continue his fight against global mining companies who threaten to destroy it.

programme.title: Take It Or Leave it
programme.desc: 30-year-old construction worker Erik suddenly finds himself a single parent when his ex-girlfriend, whom he hasn’t seen for six months, has a baby girl and informs him that she’ll put the child up for adoption unless he wants to take care of his daughter.

programme.title: Murders In Brouage
programme.desc: A young majorette is found murdered near the property of a Chinese wine grower. Although the case appears straightforward, Gendarme captain Claire soon uncovers a complicated web of xenophobia, family troubles and dirty small-town politics.

programme.title: Home Front
programme.desc: Called up to fight in the Algerian war in 1960, four veterans are forced to confront their past more than forty years after they have returned to France. Despite keeping silent all this while, small events spark painful memories of their untold stories.

programme.title: Karakol
programme.desc: After recently losing her father, Clara discovers a passport, foreign bills and letters while going through his things. Suspecting that he is living a secret life, she embarks on a trip to Karakil, a lake in Tajikistan, to find out the truth.

programme.title: Broll: Buried Alive
programme.desc: Gravedigger Max Broll and retired soccer star Baroni team up to find Max’s stepmother Tilda, the local police commissioner, who has been abducted and buried alive in the woods. The clock is ticking – Tilda won`t survive more than 48 hours underground.

programme.title: I'm Not In Love
programme.desc: After receiving a marriage ultimatum from a woman he's not sure he truly loves, Rob is up against the clock to realise he should stop looking for the fabled 'Miss Right' and learn to see what's right in front of him.

programme.title: Road To Your Heart
programme.desc: In this sweet road-trip movie, Basson, a young businessman journeys to Cape Town for his father’s funeral and to fulfill certain tasks in the will. He meets bohemian Amory along the way and they encounter hilarious moments, disappointments and heartaches.

programme.title: Joy Of Fatherhood
programme.desc: Felix enjoys his single life to the fullest, but a ferret bites him, sterilizing him in the process. He tries everything in his power to find the soon-to-be mother of his only child, the result of his first and last sperm donation.

programme.title: Take It Or Leave it
programme.desc: 30-year-old construction worker Erik suddenly finds himself a single parent when his ex-girlfriend, whom he hasn’t seen for six months, has a baby girl and informs him that she’ll put the child up for adoption unless he wants to take care of his daughter.

programme.title: A Butterfly's Heart
programme.desc: Juozapas is a quiet boy who cultivates insects in an abandoned house. He has a big bulge under his weird sweater and the school’s tough kids call him “balloon”. Rugilè moves to town and becomes Juozapas’ friend. She is the first to discover his secret.

programme.title: Home Front
programme.desc: Called up to fight in the Algerian war in 1960, four veterans are forced to confront their past more than forty years after they have returned to France. Despite keeping silent all this while, small events spark painful memories of their untold stories.

programme.title: Black As The Snow 2: Dead At The Summit
programme.desc: An SUV races over the cliffs into the depths - the driver is killed instantly. The dead man was apparently involved in a robbery but there is no trace of the loot. French Officer Vivier and Swiss Captain Meyer once again team up to solve the mystery.

programme.title: Karakol
programme.desc: After recently losing her father, Clara discovers a passport, foreign bills and letters while going through his things. Suspecting that he is living a secret life, she embarks on a trip to Karakil, a lake in Tajikistan, to find out the truth.

programme.title: King Of The Belgians
programme.desc: King Nicolas II of the Belgians is on a state visit to Istanbul when his country falls apart. With a solar storm shutting down air travel and communications, he must travel by road across the Balkans to save his country.

programme.title: Broll: Buried Alive
programme.desc: Gravedigger Max Broll and retired soccer star Baroni team up to find Max’s stepmother Tilda, the local police commissioner, who has been abducted and buried alive in the woods. The clock is ticking – Tilda won`t survive more than 48 hours underground.

programme.title: All My Friends Hate Me
programme.desc: Pete is cautiously excited about reuniting with his college crew for a birthday weekend. But, one by one, his friends slowly turn against him. Is he being punished, is he paranoid, or is he part of some sick joke?

programme.title: Until Tomorrow
programme.desc: A single mother's courage is tested when she resorts to desperate measures to hide her illegitimate child from her parents.

programme.title: Irreplaceable
programme.desc: Jean-Pierre Werner, a revered and devoted country doctor, discovers that he is suffering from an inoperable tumor. As a doctor from the city arrives to help him with his practice, Werner is troubled by the thought that he is no longer irreplaceable.

programme.title: We Look The Same
programme.desc: In this witty short about racial and culture crises, a French-born Chinese store assistant is faced with a conundrum. A Chinese tourist needs to use the store’s restroom but that’s against the rules. Is compassion worth the risk of losing one’s job?

programme.title: Otar's Death
programme.desc: Keti and her son Nika find themselves in huge trouble when he hits an old man with his car. With the victim’s family threatening to press charges, Keti must find a way to raise a huge sum of money or Nika might go to prison.
